Entries.MovieTheater_Marlon: It was a nice movie. I think Gil would've liked it.
Entries.MovieTheater_Marlon2: That was an interesting one... what'd you think, Gil?#$b#...Oh.#$b#...Heh, he's out cold, like always!#$b#...Ah, yeah, that one was dark.
